What up yo!! This is Xiao Wei! I am international students from China studying [Computer Science](http://cs.illinois.edu/) at [University of illinois at Urbana - Champaign](http://illinois.edu/)!! I am also a amateur drummer and singer!My intended research track will be computer graphics and computer music! Come and learn about me!!

### Intern in Chengdao Computer Software Company

>1.Designed the interactive Android App [“Vehicle Administration Office on Hand”](http://61.153.216.84:6080/zscg.apk); 200000 download times:
